ygData.subject: Guilds and groups
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been playing EQ for a year and a half now, and one thing that I ve come to believe is that the quality of guilds has definitely gone down hill. I ve
ygData.messageBody:
I've been playing EQ for a year and a half now, and one thing that I've come to believe is that the quality of guilds has definitely gone down hill. I've always thought of a guild as a group of friends, people that want to play together, or chat or hang out. Just recently, I was on as a newbie character I have and someone I didn't know just walked up to her and invited her into a guild.

I'd love to join a small guild that everyone is friendly, that people get together for fun once in a while, no matter what their levels.

So what do you all think, have guilds changed from what they once were?

Zuki

29 cleric of Tunare and one damn proud dwarf!


Angelfire for your free web-based e-mail. http://www.angelfire.com
